Package kdl.prox.model2.rpt.modules.pruning

Interface Summary
RPTPruningModule  
TreeSelectionModule kdl.prox.model2.rpt.modules.pruning User: afast Date: Mar 26, 2007 $Id: TreeSelectionModule.java 3658 2007-10-15 16:29:11Z schapira $
 

Class Summary
CostComplexityPruning CostComplexityPruning implements the pruning algorithm described in the monograph Classification and Regression Trees by Breiman, Friedman, Olshen and Stone.
CrossValidationSelection Cross-validation Tree selection for pruning involves learning trees on cross-validation samples.
DefaultPruningModule The most basic pruning plug-in: do nothing
DefaultTreeSelectionModule  
PruningRPTNode  
TestSampleSelection Follows Breiman, Friedman, Olshen and Stone Section 3.4.1 Applies each tree in the pruning sequence to the testContainer and picks the tree with the best score If scores are tied, the smaller, less complex tree is picked.
